title: McQueen
description: In this web you will find information about the latest car models...
news: In this week's news, we are showcasing five models that will be released during 2023:
car1: Discover a new universe of sensations with the Audi Q8 e-tron. The first 100% electric sports SUV.
car2: It is the first car in the history of Ferrari with four doors and four seats. Driving pleasure and comfort coexist in perfect harmony.
car3: It is the first supercar designed to go beyond asphalt. Equipped with specific calibrations for Strada and Sport, it introduces Rally mode.
car4: The Maserati GranTurismo offers a muscular yet aerodynamic presence, imposing yet refined. It is characterized by radical innovation.
car5: The world's first ultra-luxury electric super coupe is an emblem of craftsmanship in harmony with electric technology.
priceindex: If you want to know more about the prices of these models click here
